title: website warnings disappeared
content: Prior to the last recent mozilla update, I could browse the internet and see warning symbols (green, yellow, red) in preceeding the web address indicating if the website was likely safe or not. These warning symbols have disappeared since the last update and all I see now is a running processing symbol. Is there a setting I need to adjust to get this to work once again? (Windows 10 user, Webroot Internet Security). Thanks I attempted to screen print an example of this but get an error message.
creator: sparshall0709
